subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nicklas Lidstrom of Sweden and Sergei Fedorov of Russia, two of the inductees on Monday to the Hockey Hall of Fame, opened the N.H.L. to players beyond North America.
snippet: Nicklas Lidstrom of Sweden and Sergei Fedorov of Russia, two of the inductees on Monday to the Hockey Hall of Fame, opened the N.H.L. to players beyond North America.
